name: Transience (erencalayir, ErdemTatli, yusufekaraoglu)
description:
Controls: WASD - Move  //  "1" "2" "3" to change between forms // "4" Merge // "F" pickup/release cubes // "T" reset cubes on level

Credits

Eren Calayır (Developer, Game Designer, Level Designer)

Erdem Tatlı (Technical Artist, Developer, Game Designer)

Yusuf E. Karaoğlu (SFX, Composer, Producer) 

Eric Michalski (Developer) https://eric-michalski.itch.io/

Mflux (VFX Artist) https://minmax.itch.io/

Andrew Faubert (3D Artist)

Game

Transience is a top-down puzzle game set in parallel dimensions so called planes. The character has two souls that live in different dimensions. The way to traverse between these dimensions is to seperate ones souls from his physical self. Main goal is to traverse between these planes in order to observe the difference in phases, finding and moving hypercubes in different locations to open the way and progress further.
